Files" == "O.W.C.A. Files" is an hour-long special on Disney XD after the series finale. While the episode was set to air during the regular season, it was later announced by Disney on May 7, 2015, that the show would end with Last Day of Summer on June 12, 2015, and that the episode would air as a stand-alone special on the Disney XD network. On Disney+, the episode is split into two parts. The episode focuses on the O.W.C.A. (Organization Without a Cool Acronym), Agent P and Dr. Doofenshmirtz with the new other agents. {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="margin: auto; width: 100%" |- !! style="background:#FF8C00; color:#100; text- align:center;"|Title !! style="background:#FF8C00; color:#100; text- align:center;"|Directed by !! style="background:#FF8C00; color:#100; text- align:center;"|Written by !! style="background:#FF8C00; color:#100; text- align:center;"|Original air date !! style="background:#FF8C00; color:#100; text-align:center;"|Prod. code !! style="background:#FF8C00; color:#100; text- align:center;"|U.S. viewers (millions) |} ==Milo Murphy's Law crossover== ==Chibi Tiny Tales== Chibi Tiny Tales: Phineas and Ferb is a series of shorts that depict the characters in chibi-style animation. The shorts are a loose follow up to the Chibi Tiny Tales made for Amphibia and before that Big Hero 6: The Series. The new shorts were made in conjunction with the release of Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Candace Against the Universe. The first three shorts originally aired on Disney Channel on August 22, 2020, as a part of a Phineas and Ferb marathon. ==Home media== {| class="wikitable" |- |+Phineas and Ferb home media releases ! colspan=3 rowspan=2|Season || rowspan=2|Episodes || colspan=2|Release dates |- !
